page.title: 04THE MELKSHAM NEWS
page.content: The Melksham News has been running for 4 years. It gets the money to produce the paper from advertising. Quite a lot of people advertise, but not as many as the editor had hoped. The paper is free and every house in Melksham has one. People who deliver themare aged between 14 & 40. They have to go on 20 rounds and have 40 people. People write in the newspaper about issues like the building of housing estates and supermarkets. The main news item at the moment is that Melksham is trying out a new bin scheme. They are changing the plastic bags to moveable dustbins. They are testing it out in parts of the town. If it is successful, all of the area will have them.
